SELECT ANNOUNCE_NO, ANNOUNCE_NAME, ANNOUNCE_COUNT, MEMBER_NICKNAME,
CASE
WHEN SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE < 1 /24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE) * 24 * 60)|| '분 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(ANNOUNCE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END ANNOUNCE_DATE
FROM "ANNOUNCEMENT" B JOIN "MEMBER" M ON(B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.ANNOUNCE_DEL_FL ='N' ORDER BY ANNOUNCE_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "ANNOUNCEMENT"
JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO)
WHERE ANNOUNCE_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND ANNOUNCE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND ANNOUNCE_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND (ANNOUNCE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR ANNOUNCE_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO ) COMMENT_COUNT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO =B. BOARD_NO) LIKE_COUNT,
CASE
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 /24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60)|| '분 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END BOARD_WRITE_DATE
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" M ON(B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_DEL_FL ='N' AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD"
JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO)
WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND (BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_CODE, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI') BOARD_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI') BOARD_UPDATE_DATE,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}) LIKE_COUNT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) LIKE_CHECK
FROM "BOARD" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}

SELECT ANNOUNCE_NO, ANNOUNCE_NAME, ANNOUNCE_CONTENT, ANNOUNCE_COUNT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, TO_CHAR(ANNOUNCE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI') ANNOUNCE_DATE, TO_CHAR(ANNOUNCE_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI') ANNOUNCE_UPDATE_DATE
FROM "ANNOUNCEMENT" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE ANNOUNCE_DEL_FL = 'N' AND ANNOUNCE_NO = #{announceNo}

SELECT LEVEL, C.* FROM (SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(COMMENT_WRITTEN_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분"') COMMENT_WRITTEN_DATE, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, PARENT_COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_DEL_FL FROM "COMMENT" JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}) C WHERE COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' OR 0 != (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" SUB WHERE SUB.PARENT_COMMENT_NO = C.COMMENT_NO AND COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') START WITH PARENT_COMMENT_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR COMMENT_NO = PARENT_COMMENT_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY COMMENT_NO
